segments.text: I see the woman’s expression is calm, almost serene as she dries her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the noise of the overflowing sink disrupts that sense of peace.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn’t she notice how dangerous this is? It angers me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy’s excitement over cookies is infectious; I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His precarious position sends shivers down my spine; it feels so risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hopeful stance adds to the absurdity of this scene; it’s almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With all this chaos, I just hope everyone comes out of it without any harm.
segments.speaker: PAR
